action_title: Protect nests and nesting sites from predation by creating new nesting sites
key_messages:
Key Messages:

One study evaluated the effects of protecting nests and nesting sites from predation by creating new nesting sites on reptile populations. This study was in Spain.

COMMUNITY RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
POPULATION RESPONSE (1 STUDY)

Reproductive success (1 study): One replicated, controlled study in Spain found that predation rate of artificial Hermannâ€™s tortoise nests in newly created nesting sites was similar to the predation rate in natural nesting sites.

BEHAVIOUR (0 STUDIES)
